flawed_nl_solution:
The number of males in the party was 2/3 * 60 guests = <<2/3*60=180/2>>180/2 males
If the total number of people at the party was 60, then there were 60 guests - 180/2 males = <<60-180/2=-30>>-30 females.
#### -30

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 180/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
